title: Sibelius v8.0.0.66 Multilingual-RBS [deepstatus]
description:
Sibelius v8.0.0.66 Multilingual WiN

Avid Sibelius 8 is the world's best-selling music notation software. Its sophisticated, yet easy-to-tools are trusted by composers, arrangers, publishers, educators and students alike. The latest Sibelius allow you to access this incredible software in more affordable ways than ever before. Now you can compose with a low-cost subscription, or own the software outright.

With Avid Sibelius 8 manage multiple copies with network licensing, or simply purchase a single license for yourself. The choice is yours! New features such as Annotate, multi-touch gestures, Surface Pro 3 pen support and so much more offer you the ability to express your creativity in innovative ways. Whether composing for a live performance, movie, television, or media entertainment - Sibelius 8 offers you professional tools at a range of prices to fit everyone's budget.

Add and edit notes quickly with just a tap of the pen.


Get up and running faster

Start using Sibelius quicklyÃ¢â‚¬â€ and easily move to different computersÃ¢â‚¬â€thanks to a revamped activation process.


Add notes and comments

Create reminders for yourself as you're composing, or communicate edits and feedback to others.


Work quicker and see more detail on Windows

See every detail in stunning clarityÃ¢â‚¬â€plus access features faster with new and improved icons.




System requirements for Sibelius:

Windows:
- 64-bit Windows 7 (SP1 or later) or Windows 8.1 (not Windows RT)
- 1+ GB of RAM
- 1 GB hard disk space for Sibelius software only
- DVD-ROM drive (only for Media Pack)
- Internet connection required for software download and activation
